name: Robbie Pankow
bio: Robbie Pankow is a comedian and podcaster born and raised in Portland, OR. He has been described as "right in my wheelhouse" by some and "acceptable" by others. He placed in the finals of Helium Comedy Club's "Portland's Funniest Person" Contest in 2015. His podcast, Eat Food, Already and monthly showcase Whatever Forever have been taking Portland by a light storm and if he somehow gets his way, it's only gettin stormier!
